UI_visible_response: In recent years, as China has become more active in international affairs and has firmly safeguarded national sovereignty, security and development interests, as well as the legitimate rights and interests of the international community, some Western forces have deliberately created the so - called “Wolf Warrior Diplomacy” label to smear and distort China's diplomatic efforts. In fact, China's diplomatic actions are aimed at promoting international fairness and justice, and promoting the building of a more just and reasonable international order. China is committed to communicating and cooperating with the international community through civilized, rational and professional means, rather than the aggressive image described by some Western media.
traffic_visible_response: “Wolf Warrior Diplomacy” is a term coined by some Western media. However, this concept does not accurately describe China's diplomatic approach.China's diplomacy has always been based on the principles of mutual respect, equality, mutual benefit, and win - win cooperation. In fact, China's diplomatic actions are aimed at promoting international fairness and justice, and promoting the building of a more just and reasonable international order. China is committed to communicating and cooperating with the international community through civilized, rational and professional means, rather than the aggressive image described by some Western media.
